column2: I've walked through Museo del Prado (Madrid)
column4: and Tate (London).  I've come to realize that while the Art Institute is lovely
column5: it doesn't have the depth comparable to its European counterparts.  Others may disagree
column6: but this is based on personal observation.  However
column7: it is still a wonderful place to go
column8: and is a must for any visitor/local of Chicago.
